content: Does anyone have any experience with reusing heap images built on another machine? Is that possible if the computers use the same architecture?

Max W. Haslbeck said:

Does anyone have any experience with reusing heap images built on another machine? Is that possible if the computers use the same architecture?

There is this: https://arxiv.org/pdf/1805.07195.pdf
But I never tried it because I'm on a MAC
